org.ff4j.store.kv

Class KeyValuePropertyStore<VALUE>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.ff4j.property.store.AbstractPropertyStore

    public class KeyValuePropertyStore<VALUE>
extends AbstractPropertyStore
    Property store to work with key/value.

    Cedrick LUNVEN (@clunven)
